coded_answer.p: I have received your letter dated on the 12th of juneJune 2001. I am very happy to help you and I hope that the informationsinformation, that I am going to give you, will be enoughsatisfactory.

The international student conference will be in the Palace Hotel in Lausanne. The Hotelhotel is a big building in the middle of the town near the placesquare, "St-François". And the name of the street is "Grand-Chêne". You can notcannot miss it.

After the conference, we are going to stay in the Palace Hotel but instead of to staystaying in the conference room, we are going to move to the reception room where a dinner will be preparedserved for us. Afterwards, a live band areis going to play for the rest of the night. ForRegarding the clothes, you have to wear something smart and classic.
If you want to stay in Lausanne during your afternoon freefree afternoon, the best thing to do is to go to Ouchy. There, you can enjoy the Landscapelandscape and have a sunbathsunbathe.
The aim of this report is to give you further informationsinformation on an interesting building to visit in Lausanne. It is based on my own experience.

The OlympiqueOlympic Museum is situated near the lake and offeroffers, for the tourist, an unbelievable view onof the mountains and the lake. But also, the museum havehas a lot of gardens with several statues. BesidesAlso, the architecture of the building is beautiful and very modern. First of all, the main interest of the museum is the olympicOlympic history. You can find a lot of documentarydocumentariesdocuments about it and you have several competitors personal objects. In addition, you can play with several interactive gamegames and learn about the rules of the olympicOlympic games.

The principal reason is the cheapestcheap price. You pay only to FRS for the entry and you can stay in all the time that you want. On the other hand, if youthere are more than 10 people, you can havepay a group price and pay only 6 Frs per person. It seems that this solutionoption might be the best way to visit this museum.

To sum up, the Olympic Museum is a very attractive place and could be a good trip with your family or your student group. Therefore, if you want to learn something about the Olympic Games, it must be the best place for thisyou.
